sub_title: Head of S&OP at albelli-Photobox Group
summary:
Some 10 years ago, my career journey started and it took me through some wonderful places & employers of all kinds. Could I have imagined back then that today I will be working for such a fantastic employer as Albelli as the Head of Sales & Operations Planning?

It all began with a trip away from my home country, Bulgaria. This journey was born out of a small aspiration - to experience the world. After once participating in a student exchange program, my passion for work and travel was ignited and during my Bachelor degree I enrolled for a student exchange program in the USA on another 3 occasions.

In 2015, I obtained my Bachelor’s degree in Finance and Financial management in Sofia. An year later I decided to move to the Netherlands and to study at Erasmus University, Rotterdam. The next two years I spent studying, while working full-time, and in the end I graduated successfully with a Master’s degree in Economics and Business, specialising in urban, port and transport economics.

Currently, I am based in Rotterdam and working on my own projects as a freelancer. For the past two years I’ve been working at Albelli, where I recently got promoted from a Financial role to be the company’s new Head of S&OP.

profile_positions.description:
Shortly after being promoted to be Albelli's Head of S&OP, I was rewarded with the assignment to manage the integration of S&OP for the newly merged Albelli-Photobox group.
I am proud to say that the above concluded with me being appointed as Albelli-Photobox group's Head of Sales and Operations Planning!
profile_positions.title: Head of Sales and Operations Planning @ Albelli-Photobox Group

profile_positions.description:
Only a year after joining Albelli, I was promoted to take on the role Head of Sales & Operations Planning (S&OP). 

As Head of S&OP I am responsible to:

•	Execute and continuously improve the S&OP process in all its aspects, to support optimizing Albelli Group's gross profit
•	Monitor and steer critically important for the health of the business KPIs
•	Maintain and satisfy cross-functional dependencies and maintain stakeholder relationship with all business units: Leadership team(s), Marketing & Sales, Manufacturing, Customer Care, Supply Chain, HR, IT, Data, Pricing and Analytics
•	Take ownership of timely and accurately delivery of sales orders and production volumes projections within the financial year and beyond
•	Produce the budget figures for sales orders and production volumes
•	Contribute to business performance optimization and company growth projects
And more.

As Head of S&OP, I play a vital role for the Albelli's growth and business development.
profile_positions.title: Head of Sales & Operations Planning @ Albelli Group

profile_positions.description:
Financial modelling and reporting 
•	Draw up plans and financial reports to inform, monitor and instigate operational actions to meet company objectives. 
•	Make financial analyses for executive members, functional managers and teams to give insights and explanations regarding outcomes and how these reflect on business performance. 
•	Provide high-quality information and business insights that assist key stakeholders in making informed business decisions. 
•	Take ownership of a timely and accurate delivery of financial reporting cycles to the FP&A Manager, CFO and other finance and leadership stakeholders. 

Business controlling 
•	Analyze the financial impact of organizational policies/business cases and advise key business stakeholders towards optimizing business decisions and/or investments, while reducing risk. 
•	Support the business planning process; monitor the link between plans, activities and organizational strategy.
•	Own substantiations of financial entries related to the scope of Commercial FP&A

Beyond the above, all of which are characteristic for the Financial Analyst role, in this role I supported the establishing of the Sales and Operations Planning process.
